segments.text: Good evening . Could you let us have a double room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A week or ten days . We'd like to have a quiet room , if possible-not too near the street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , you can have Room 313 . It's at the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the price per day ' ? And are the meals included or extra ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , sir . Will you register , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . The porter will show you to your room
segments.speaker: S1
